verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Artist: 7eventh Time Down
Song: "God Is On The Move"
Intro: B - F# - C#

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Verse 1]
Anytime a heart turns from
Darkness to light
Anytime temptation comes and
Someone stands to fight
Anytime somebody lives to
Serve and not be served

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know - I know - I know - I know
[Chorus]
God is on the move,
On the move Hallelujah
God is on the move
In many mighty ways
God is on the move,
On the move Hallelujah
God is on the move
On the move today

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Verse 2]
Anytime in weakness someone
Falls upon their knees
Or Dares to speak the Truth
That sets men free
Anytime the choice is made to
Stand upon the Word

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I know - I know - I know - I know

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
[Bridge]
I see a generation
Standing on the truth
In each in every nation
God is on the move

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
[Verse 3]
Anytime the Gospel
Stirs a searching souls
And Someone says:
"Send me, Here I go"
I know - I know - I know - I know
